narration.utterances: Khayanga aliishi na wazazi wake kwa furaha hadi siku walipofariki akiwa na umri wa miaka kumi

text.sentence: Khayanga aliishi na wazazi wake kwa furaha hadi siku walipofariki akiwa na umri wa miaka kumi.

narration.utterances: Khayanga alichukuliwa ili kutunzwa na mama mmoja wa ukoo wake aliyeitwa Rosa

text.sentence: Khayanga alichukuliwa ili kutunzwa na mama mmoja wa ukoo wake aliyeitwa Rosa.

narration.utterances: Rosa alikuwa mkarimu kwa Khayanga

text.sentence: Rosa alikuwa mkarimu kwa Khayanga.

narration.utterances: Lakini mama huyu alikuwa mzee maskini na alikuwa amedhoofika sana

text.sentence: Lakini, mama huyu alikuwa mzee, maskini na alikuwa amedhoofika sana.

narration.utterances: Khayanga alitembelea makaburi ya wazazi wake mara kwa mara ili kuwaeleza matatizo yake

text.sentence: Khayanga alitembelea makaburi ya wazazi wake mara kwa mara ili kuwaeleza matatizo yake.

narration.utterances: Siku moja wakati alipotembea makaburini alipewa zawadi

text.sentence: Siku moja wakati alipotembea makaburini, alipewa zawadi.

narration.utterances: Na zawadi yenyewe ilikuwa kibuyu cha kipekee kilichotoka kwenye makaburi ya wazazi wake

text.sentence: Na zawadi yenyewe ilikuwa kibuyu cha kipekee kilichotoka kwenye makaburi ya wazazi wake.

narration.utterances: Kibuyu hicho kiliimba wimbo mtamu na wa kuburudisha

text.sentence: Kibuyu hicho kiliimba wimbo mtamu na wa kuburudisha.

narration.utterances: Wimbo wenyewe uliimbwa hivi Khayanga ee Khayanga

text.sentence: Wimbo wenyewe uliimbwa hivi: Khayanga, ee, Khayanga!

narration.utterances: Mtoto wetu mpendwa

text.sentence: Mtoto wetu, mpendwa!

narration.utterances: Tuko na wewe mpendwa

text.sentence: Tuko na wewe, mpendwa!

narration.utterances: Shika kibuyu mpendwa

text.sentence: Shika kibuyu, mpendwa!

narration.utterances: Kibebe kote mpendwa

text.sentence: Kibebe kote, mpendwa!

narration.utterances: Kikuliwaze mpendwa

text.sentence: Kikuliwaze, mpendwa!

narration.utterances: Khayanga aligundua kuwa hiyo sauti ilikuwa ya mamake

text.sentence: Khayanga aligundua kuwa hiyo sauti ilikuwa ya mamake.

narration.utterances: Alikihifadhi Kibuyu hicho ili kimfariji kila alipohisi huzuni na upweke

text.sentence: Alikihifadhi Kibuyu hicho ili kimfariji kila alipohisi huzuni na upweke.

narration.utterances: Khayanga alikibeba Kibuyu chake cha kipekee kila alipokwenda

text.sentence: Khayanga alikibeba Kibuyu chake cha kipekee kila alipokwenda.

narration.utterances: Kilimlinda alipokwenda mtoni kuchota maji

text.sentence: Kilimlinda alipokwenda mtoni kuchota maji.

narration.utterances: Kwa sababu ya Kibuyu chake Khayanga alihisi kwamba wazazi wake walikuwa naye na walimlinda

text.sentence: Kwa sababu ya Kibuyu chake, Khayanga alihisi kwamba wazazi wake walikuwa naye na walimlinda.

narration.utterances: Siku moja jambo baya lilitendekea Kibuyu chake

text.sentence: Siku moja, jambo baya lilitendekea Kibuyu chake.

narration.utterances: Kilivunjika alipokuwa akichota maji mtoni

text.sentence: Kilivunjika alipokuwa akichota maji mtoni.

narration.utterances: Khayanga naye pia alivunjika moyo kwa sababu hiyo

text.sentence: Khayanga naye pia alivunjika moyo kwa sababu hiyo.

narration.utterances: Khayanga alivishika vigae vya Kibuyu kilichovunjika mikononi mwake akaimba Baba yangu mama yangu

text.sentence: Khayanga alivishika vigae vya Kibuyu kilichovunjika mikononi mwake akaimba: Baba yangu, mama yangu!

narration.utterances: Kibuyu mlichonipa Jamani kimevunjika

text.sentence: Kibuyu mlichonipa, Jamani kimevunjika.

narration.utterances: Nieleze nifanyeje

text.sentence: Nieleze nifanyeje?

narration.utterances: Baba yangu mama yangu Nipe ishara nyingine Nijue mko na mimi

text.sentence: Baba yangu, mama yangu, Nipe ishara nyingine, Nijue mko na mimi.

narration.utterances: Khayanga akasikia sauti ya mamake ikimwambia Khayanga mtoto wetu Hivyo vigae okota Na maji uchote navyo Ioshe miguu yako Ukimaliza kuosha Uyafunge macho yako

text.sentence: Khayanga akasikia sauti ya mamake ikimwambia: Khayanga mtoto wetu, Hivyo vigae okota, Na maji uchote navyo, Ioshe miguu yako, Ukimaliza kuosha, Uyafunge macho yako.

narration.utterances: Khayanga alitii alivyoambiwa na ghafla Kibuyu kilichovunjika kilishikana tena

text.sentence: Khayanga alitii alivyoambiwa na ghafla, Kibuyu kilichovunjika kilishikana tena.

narration.utterances: Alikichukua akakishika kifuani mwake kwa furaha kubwa

text.sentence: Alikichukua akakishika kifuani mwake kwa furaha kubwa.

narration.utterances: Khayanga aliendelea kukibeba Kibuyu chake kila mahali alipokwenda

text.sentence: Khayanga aliendelea kukibeba Kibuyu chake kila mahali alipokwenda.

narration.utterances: Popote alipopita watu waliulizana Hiki ni kibuyu cha aina gani

text.sentence: Popote alipopita, watu waliulizana, "Hiki ni kibuyu cha aina gani?"

narration.utterances: Kibuyu hicho chake kilimsaidia kupata chochote alichohitaji

text.sentence: Kibuyu hicho chake kilimsaidia kupata chochote alichohitaji.

narration.utterances: Kwa sababu ya Kibuyu hicho cha kipekee Khayanga alijua kwamba wazazi wake walimwangalia kila wakati

text.sentence: Kwa sababu ya Kibuyu hicho cha kipekee, Khayanga alijua kwamba wazazi wake walimwangalia kila wakati.

narration.utterances: Alijua kwamba hakuna kitu kibaya kingeweza kumtendekea

text.sentence: Alijua kwamba hakuna kitu kibaya kingeweza kumtendekea.
